All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    BBQ_Chicken
    Represents a BBQ Chicken Pizza.
    BuildYourOwn
    Represents a Build-Your-Own Pizza.
    ChicagoFragment
    The ChicagoFragment class displays all information regarding the Chicago Pizza being created and allows the user to modify the pizza.
    ChicagoPizza
    The Chicago Pizza Factory defers instantiation of Chicago Pizzas to the 4 subclasses representing each pizza flavor.
    Crust
    The Crust enum is a class representing the 6 different crusts, depending on the Pizza style.
    Customizable
    The Customizable Interface contains the add and remove abstract methods that are implemented in the StoreOrder and Pizza classes.
    Deluxe
    Represents a Deluxe Pizza.
    MainActivity
    The Main Activity serves to provide functionality to the base view of the application, containing the bottom navigation bar and the fragment container.
    Meatzza
    Represents a Meatzza Pizza.
    NewYorkFragment
    The NewYorkFragment class displays all information regarding the New York Pizza being created and allows the user to modify the pizza.
    NYPizza
    The NY Pizza Factory defers instantiation of NY Pizzas to the 4 subclasses representing each pizza flavor.
    Order
    This class represents an order made by the employees of RU Pizzeria.
    OrderFragment
    The OrderFragment class displays all information regarding the current order and allows the user to edit the order.
    OrderRecyclerViewAdapter
    The OrderRecyclerViewAdapter provides the means of binding individual pizza data of an order to views that will be displayed in the Order RecyclerView.
    OrderRecyclerViewAdapter.MyViewHolder
    Represents the View Holder which will display all the information related to an individual pizza.
    Pizza
    The Pizza abstract class represents a Pizza in the pizza creation system.
    PizzaFactory
    The PizzaFactory interface allows for the customization of Pizza objects depending on the type of Pizza that a user wants to create.
    RecyclerViewInterface
    This interface ensures the definition of any behaviors required by a Fragment/Activity containing a RecyclerView
    Size
    The Size enum is a class representing the 3 different pizza sizes.
    StoreOrder
    This class stores all the orders that a store has.
    StoreOrdersFragment
    The StoreOrdersFragment class displays all the orders placed for the store by binding the store order data to the store order layout.
    StoreRecyclerViewAdapter
    The StoreRecyclerViewAdapter provides the means to bind all of the store's orders' data to views that will be displayed in the Store Order RecyclerView.
    StoreRecyclerViewAdapter.MyViewHolder
    Represents the View Holder which will display all the information related to an individual order.
    Topping
    The Topping enum is a class representing the 3 different pizza sizes.
